pullrequest.title: Add OBJ support to mesh manager

content.raw: I know you didn't add this code, but this seems like a bug.  If the extension that comes in is not one of the above types, then we print an ignerr, `*loader` remains NULL, and then we dereference the NULL down below.  I think we should probably return a nullptr if we can't find the loader.
content.html: I know you didn't add this code, but this seems like a bug. If the extension that comes in is not one of the above types, then we print an ignerr, *loader remains NULL, and then we dereference the NULL down below. I think we should probably return a nullptr if we can't find the loader.
